segments.text: Linda ? Is that you ? I haven't seen you in ages !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi George ! It's good to see you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What have you been up to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just opened up my own business not long ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good for you ! What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a professional party planner here in the city . I do catering and all that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I knew some day I would be able to profit from your love of fun !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't know about the profit part yet . But I am really having fun !
segments.speaker: S2
